item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

We all get out of balance from time to time.

Have you ever tried Painting to bring you back into alignment?

 

‘‘Art can inspire us with fresh insights into reality. The feelings it expresses and evokes in others are valid only if they promote our quest for greater understanding. The more one opens one‘s limited consciousness to infinite possibilities, the more our Creative work can become the sort of art which mankind has always recognized as great.‘‘  - J. Donald Walters

Intuitive painting is a powerful and exciting methodology developed by Dr. Pinki Feinstien, the founder of the Psycho-Creative Institute in Tel Aviv, Israel. It is the merging of art and spirituality. Intuitive painting can be used as a tool of self-discovery, helping to understand the self through color and form. Through painting you can recognize and develop you own creativity, bring balance and harmony back into your life, and reconnect with your own soul and creator.

 

 

 

Intuitive Painting is an amazing way to express "emotional creativity" and is enormously fun to do.

 

Discover yourself through intuitive painting

No prior artistic experience or talent is required — you only need a passion to create!


See you there!

Ellen
Motivational Facilitator

Anyone Attending this for the first time Please Call
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 The Year of Change - Painting a Spiritual Essence
